name: Trojan Cockroach
body:
This program is an undetectable **Trojan Virus** that steals data (ID, password; every key stroke) from PC and emails it back to the author. It spreads among PCs through USB drives.
## Setup 1. Change **---() and ---()** method of **TrojanCockroach.cpp** according to your wish. 2. Compile **TrojanCockroach.cpp** & **Infect.cpp** (do not rename them). 3. Place **TrojanCockroach.exe**, **Infect.exe**, **---**, **---** & **---** in the same folder. 4. Now run **TrojanCockroach.exe**. 5. Then insert a USB-Drive in your PC (see the magic!). 6. Now, insert the USB-Drive in the subject's PC and run the created shortcut for affecting. :smiling_imp: **Note:** I do not want newbies to abuse my project, so I am not revealing all the secrets. But I do believe that a real learner will learn a lot from this.
